patthana22.25:1.1_0: Naajjhattaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.25:2.1_0: Nabahiddhā nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.25:4.1_0: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana22.25:5.1_0: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.25:6.1_1: adhipatiyā dve …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate cha.
